thread.title: Cuppa Coffee in Macau for sensational toffee latte and more
thread.title_full: Cuppa Coffee in Macau for sensational toffee latte and more | South China Morning Post

title: Cuppa Coffee in Macau for sensational toffee latte and more
text:
If you're in need of a caffeine fix after an exhausting day of sightseeing then head to Cuppa Coffee in Taipa for a well-crafted brew (the vanilla toffee lattes are sensational) and a tasty pastry. The staff are friendly and the venue has become a favourite hangout of local creatives, so it's a fun place for a spot of people watching. You can also recharge with a healthy lunch — try the quinoa or Greek salads — or choose from the new selection of pizzas and tarts.
Cuppa Coffee, Rua Fernao Mendes Pinto, 104-106, Taipa, Macau, (+853 2882 5201)
